gameutils.gui
Class Widget

java.lang.Object
  gameutils.gui.Widget
All Implemented Interfaces:
Element
Direct Known Subclasses:
Button, Label
public abstract class Widget
extends Object
implements Element

A Widget could be added to any Screen.

Author:
Roi Atalla
